text: Arlene Carol Dahl (August 11, 1925 - November 29, 2021) was an American actress. She was a former MGM contract star. Dahl became famous in the 1950s. She was born in Minneapolis and starred in many movies. She was the mother of actor Lorenzo Lamas. Dahl died on November 29, 2021 at her home in New York City, aged 96. ==References== Category:Actors from Minneapolis Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American movie actors Category:1925 births Category:2021 deaths
title: Arlene Dahl
